Package arcade.vis

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentDrawer2D
    Drawer for agent grids in 2D.
    AgentDrawer2D.Hexagonal
    AgentDrawer2D for drawing hexagonal agents
    AgentDrawer2D.Rectangular
    AgentDrawer2D for drawing rectangular agents
    AgentDrawer3D
    Drawer for agent grids in 3D.
    AgentDrawer3D.Hexagonal
    AgentDrawer3D for drawing hexagonal agents
    AgentDrawer3D.Rectangular
    AgentDrawer3D for drawing rectangular agents
    AuxDrawer2D
    Drawer for custom visualizations in 2D.
    AuxDrawer2D.Graph
    AuxDrawer2D for drawing a graph.
    AuxDrawer2D.Label
    AuxDrawer2D for adding a label to a panel.
    AuxDrawer2D.LabelFieldPortrayal2D
    Wrapper for MASON class that changes font style.
    AuxDrawer2D.OvalPortrayal2DWrapper
    Wrapper for MASON class that change node colors
    AuxDrawer2D.RectGraph
    AuxDrawer2D.Graph for drawing a rectangular graph.
    AuxDrawer2D.RectGrid
    AuxDrawer2D for drawing a rectangular grid.
    AuxDrawer2D.SimpleEdgePortrayal2DEdgeWrapper
    Wrapper for MASON class that changes edge colors based on weight
    AuxDrawer2D.SimpleEdgePortrayal2DGridWrapper
    Wrapper for MASON class that changes thickness and color of edges.
    AuxDrawer2D.TriGraph
    AuxDrawer2D.Graph for drawing a triangular graph.
    AuxDrawer2D.TriGrid
    AuxDrawer2D for drawing a triangular grid.
    ColorMaps
    Container class for commonly used color maps.
    Drawer
    Visualization for Grid and Lattice objects.
    EnvDrawer2D
    Drawer for environment lattices in 2D.
    EnvDrawer2D.Rectangular
    EnvDrawer2D for drawing rectangular grid.
    EnvDrawer2D.Triangular
    EnvDrawer2D for drawing triangular grid.
    EnvDrawer3D
    Drawer for environment lattices in 3D.
    EnvDrawer3D.Rectangular
    EnvDrawer3D for drawing rectangular grid.
    EnvDrawer3D.Triangular
    EnvDrawer3D for drawing triangular grid.
    GrowthVisualization2D
    Extension of Visualization for 2D simulations.
    GrowthVisualization2D.Hexagonal
    GrowthVisualization2D for hexagonal simulations
    GrowthVisualization2D.Rectangular
    GrowthVisualization2D for rectangular simulations
    GrowthVisualization3D
    Extension of Visualization for 3D simulations.
    GrowthVisualization3D.Hexagonal
    GrowthVisualization3D for hexagonal simulations
    GrowthVisualization3D.Rectangular
    GrowthVisualization3D for rectangular simulations
    Panel
    Wrapper for JFrame windows containing visualizations.
    Visualization
    Extension of GUIState wrapper of simulations for visualization.
